item.description:
India's #1 DJ in 2011.  DJ Lloyd is the official remix dj for Dabbang!  Salman's Khan favorate DJ!!  Resident DJ for Music Ka Maha Muqqabla on Star Plus!!  Don't miss this night!!

Resident of Poison Night Club, Mumbai & India's #1 DJ in 2011 is in Boston on April 2nd, 2011!
Where: Felt Boston -3rd floor, 1533 Washington St, Boston-so don't miss it!!
Early Bird Specials! Tickets will be $25 at the door and Regular price.

Doors open 10pm.  Dance till 2am!!

Information:

http://cities.sulekha.com/boston/events/Dance/2011/03/mumbai-samba-with-celebrity-dj-lloyd-indias-1-dj.htm

http://www.GenerationDesi.com or http://www.Sulekha.com

VIDEO 1:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_detailpage&v=OC3jtm1lHHY

item.why: Because it is fun. Lets dance the night away with good friends.
item.name: Mumbai Samba with Celebrity Bollywood/Bhangra DJ Lloyd from Mumbai!
